network_section_ref.description: RIS_ID of the same network section in the RIS.net of the other country, which shares the common border and is responsible for providing the geometric data.

up_fairway_km.description: Fairway km of the upstream node, by which the network section is formed and connected to others.

down_fairway_km.description: Fairway km of the downstream node, by which the network section is formed and connected to others.

fairway_section_code.description: The Fairway Section Code represents the coding of a waterway section within a national network and is only unique in combination with the country code.

comex_section_ref.description: COMEX section reference code (CNTRYCODE + FW_CODE + SEQ_NR), included for backwards compatibility.

tentec.description: Indicates whether the corresponding network section is part of the TENtec network or not. true = is part, false = is not.
